column4: i need some help setting up a wireless connection, could anyone help?
i have my wireless set up through networking
and wifi radar shows the essid and signal
but i can never get an ip address
i don't get what you mean by 'sorted out all the webcode"
have you put the wepcode for the ssid your trying to connect to?
yep i've inputted my essid and am connecting using dhcp (no wep)
hmm thats wierd, mine jumps on other networks if there is no wepcode on them just like that... hmm
have you made sure your adjusting the settings for the right adapter?
it came up with etho, ath0, lo and wifi0
what eth is next to your wireless card in the list
i don't think i can find the info you requested-- what is it that you wnat?
to make sure that your ubuntu is trying to use wifi01 for to go out on the network or if its still on lo or eth0
